comments.body: Go Mudkip. Just don't touch the lush cave.

399566525251 Well, we have Wolves

I think that pangolins are found in cleared and cultivated areas, and savannah grassland, in general, they occur where large numbers of food (ants and termites) are found (If ants are added to the game if not they are just found in savannah). If killed they drop scales that you can use to make stronger armor or shields, the food they drop can heal you for a hart or 2 when cooked if not it gives you hunger or nausea for 20seconds or more. When attacked he curls up so he takes less damage and rolls out of danger far away from the enemy and curls out of its shell.
A good program to use for modeling minecraft animals is Blockbench. It's free and it has a web-app version so you don't need to download anything
Thanks a lot Jack
العب
The geomancer attacks do not fit in minecraft
The geomancer could drop 2-5 gunpowder, being a better source of it than creepers.
Or perhaps you could craft a cart separately? A minecart would seem weird being pulled by donkeys.
Agreed. Goats should crouch before they jump, like foxes or cats.

Agreed. Although i'd imagine that there will be many changes to the goat's mechanics since the update won't be coming out until the summer of 2021. I'm sure the jumping animation will be a lot more natural like how the horses jump or how foxes jump.

Also I don't personally think they should jump like horses. Maybe more upright since goats often use their knees to leap up and down mountain sides. They hardly ever use just their hein legs to jump because they need to keep a sturdy stance with a lot of control in order to maneuver down such tricky terrain.
That was a crude early snapshot I'm sure final realise will be much better
Agreed. Love the mechanic, but the animation is a little wonky. I'd love to see em spiced up a bit!
The goats' jumps must maintain their reach, but it would be much more realistic if the jump height were lower
I think the "transition" animation can be abrupt, like opening trapdoors, doors.
Yeah, but I don't think it should really be related to anything. I think it should just be random for each cave.

If they get different colors, the color pallets used should be close to several of the "lighter", stained glass colors. I feel that Lime, Cyan (default), magenta, pink, & silver would be the optimal choices. Perhaps naming one, via a Name Tag would Cycle through these 5 colors.

they can pick up the vegitation and nylem until there is no more biome left. its quite tragic.
Nylium can spread like grass and using bone meal on nylium grows vegetation so there is no need for this. Also, I need the Endermen to pick up the nylium so I don’t need Silk Touch,
It doesn't shrink, it spreads. Endermen with something in their hands don't despawn. I think it looks really interesting and should be kept.

1.19 Arrived, changing the mob spawning rules so enderman spawn in higher light levels. This has made the warped forest untenable for any type of long-term habitation. Endermen continue to spawn (in greater numbers now), pick up nylium and vegetation at an unreasonable rate, and then just accumulate in random corners where they can't put their items down and therefore can't despawn. It was a problem before 1.19, but could be solved with torches. Now it's absolutely ridiculous. There's more endermen holding items near my warped forest base than there are in the End itself. PLEASE revert enderman spawning to how it was before.

I agree completely with the comment made here. Endermen spawning by the dozen in the Nether and can't despawn because they pick up something and accumulate in places where they can't place it down. I had to kill off 220 Endermen just around my Nether base. I can't see any chance to spawn-proof the place whithout changing the biome rigorously. 

Aggravating is the fact, that Endermen do spawn on Warped Wart blocks, making almost every Nether tree a valid spawn location. This wasn't a big problem before the light level update, as the light levels given by Shroom lights prevented most spawn attempts.

The spawn conditions for Endermen should be reverted or new measures against the overpopulation of Endermen introduced.
They shouldn’t kill mice and chickens mojang should add a mouse mob
cool good idea
Great idea!
how would it fair against a spino?
They would turn into a spider in the overworld

I just came with an alternative Mandrake idea too. I'll post mine here as a comment :)

Found in Woodland Mansions, it is a plant-like creature with magical properties which can be used to make potions.

It is very rare, similar to enchanted golden apple.

The Mandrake can be planted on crying obsidian and can spread to nearby free crying obsidian blocks, during full moons.

Uprooting one planted sample, 1-3 Mandrakes will drop alive like mobs, they will give out a cry and would try to attack nearby players, poisoning and confusing them. If they see nobody nearby, they would return to nearby free crying obsidian blocks and become planted.

Mandrakes which cannot find a free block, would drop as an item.

The confusion effect makes mobs and bosses to stop attacking for 5 seconds and would drop equipped armor and weapons. Creepers would abort explosions.

If the creature is a player, the confusion effect would mix half of his inventory and hot-bar. Equipped armor pieces which have curse of binding, would be unequipped. Normal items will stay equipped. Shield slot item would always remain equipped.

Shield can be used to block Mandrake's attacks.

Uprooting of planted Mandrakes can be caused like for normal plants but also by fire or explosions (even if the crying obsidian is not destroyed).

Potions made using Mandrakes give the confusion effect which can be used to calm mobs and retrieve their armor without killing them and to unequip bound items. It may have some PvP use too on special maps.

I'm pretty sure the music disk "Dog" once existed, but Mojang just fused it in to "Cat".

Cat and dogs were genuinely the best musics in Minecraft but I think they removed dog and it’s really sad, so I think they should add them back but as a rare extension of cat because it makes the music even more complete and fun if both are on the same disc. Hope some people agree with me and we can make it come back ;)
